name: Sprinklr, Inc.
description: Sprinklr, Inc. is a leading customer experience management platform that empowers businesses to connect with their customers across various channels and enhance their brand presence. Founded in 2013 by Ragy Thomas, Sprinklr offers a unified solution that integrates social media management, customer engagement, and analytics, helping organizations to deliver impactful customer experiences. With a focus on enterprise-level solutions, Sprinklr serves a diverse clientele, including Fortune 500 companies, by providing tools for social media marketing, advertising, customer service, and audience engagement. The company leverages artificial intelligence and machine learning to analyze customer data and provide actionable insights that drive strategic decision-making. Sprinklr's mission is to enable every organization to make their customers happier by transforming the way they interact and communicate. With a comprehensive suite of products, Sprinklr is positioned to lead the way in the evolving landscape of customer experience, allowing brands to maintain a consistent voice and presence across all touchpoints.
